sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		MovieSK as integer,
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		MovieCategorySK as byte,
		MovieRatingSK as byte,
		MovieRunTimeMin as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Parquet1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://ophackmdwteam10stgacc.dfs.core.windows.net/cosmosdbmovies/Movies"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Parquet1,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [id] <> null and [id] <> "")
in
  #"Filtered rows";
